title: Blight
content:
Blight Level 4 Necromancy Spell 8~64 Damage 8d8 Necrotic Plants take maximum damage from this spell, and have Disadvantage on the Saving Throw against it. On Save: Target still takes half damage. No effect on undead and constructs. 9m CON Save Action Level 4 Spell Slot

Level 4 Necromancy Spell

Plants take maximum damage from this spell, and have Disadvantage on the Saving Throw against it.
